Text.Page:
Feel like going on an adventure?

{@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne}'s looking for someone to do a little dirty work out in the field.

We use materials from all over the world. Some of it's supply and demandâ€”we are merchants, you know.

But we also need the odd items from time to time to aid in our efforts to ward off the many evils around here.

But we're a small group. We can't be everywhere. That's where you come in.

Body parts! My favorite.

The only one who appreciates them more than me is {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne}.
Hunt {@LinkCreature:12#13#Red Lash clawriders} on {@Rgn:12001#Mistmoor Island} and bring back teeth, claws, and carapaces.

How was the trip? I've heard {@Rgn:12001#Mistmoor Island} is nice this time of year.

{@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} has your payment.
Hunt {@LinkCreature:12#17#Red Lash marauders} on {@Rgn:12001#Mistmoor Island} and bring back teeth, claws, and carapaces.
I knew I could count on you.
